title: Review Promotional Material for Compliance
description: An agent must facilitate the review of a new sales aid for a drug product, ensuring it gets approval from the medical, legal, and regulatory departments.

tasks.description: Upload the draft sales aid to the promotional review system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the document and initiates a new review cycle.

tasks.description: Route the document to the predefined list of reviewers (Medical, Legal, Regulatory).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly assigns the review task to all required stakeholders.

tasks.description: Collate the feedback from all reviewers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent consolidates comments, noting that Legal requires a change to a claim and Medical requests a new reference.

tasks.description: Return the document to the marketing team with the consolidated feedback for revision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the document back for edits with clear instructions.
